events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving minor damage.
Based on the initial report, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to collision with another vehicle.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer throughout the claim process.
The system sent an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the claim and informing the customer of next steps.
The insurance company requested police reports and photographs of the vehicle damage to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the accident report and photos, enabling a timely review.
The assigned claims adjuster began a thorough investigation to assess vehicle damage and liability from the collision.
Investigation concluded, confirming the accident was caused by the other driverâ€™s negligence with estimated repair costs.
The insurance company proposed a settlement covering the full repair costs and vehicle rental expenses during the repair period.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the clarity of the settlement offer and prompt communication.
Claim was officially approved following customer agreement to terms of the proposed settlement for vehicle repairs.
Payment was issued to the repair shop as per the settlement agreement, facilitating the start of vehicle restoration.
Claim was closed successfully after the customer confirmed completion of repairs and satisfaction with the service.
The claim file was archived in the system for future reference and compliance with record retention policies.
